thankYouText: Thanks, we'll be in touch shortly!
meetingsText:
If you are interested in working with Br&newweddings Freya is more than happy to travel to you, or you can visit us at the Studio to chat through your ideas.
By Train: 45 minutes from Central London, our nearest station is Didcot Parkway. 
By Car: 10 minutes from junction 13 of the M4.

An initial meeting is included in the cost of your proposal* 
(*either in London or within 1 hours drive of the studio ox11 0pw)

Meetings are by appointment only.

AN INITIAL MEETING IS INCLUDED IN THE COST OF YOUR PROPOSAL* (*EITHER IN LONDON OR WITHIN 1 HOURS DRIVE OF THE STUDIO OX11 0PW)

MEETINGS ARE BY APPOINTMENT ONLY.
